item.title: Dragon claws spec problem!
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

ok if I use the special attack hit 1 is random hit 2 is 0 hit 3 us 0 hit 4 is 0.
Why hits the spec only 1 time and then 0?
here are the codes::::
This I added under: public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

public boolean DCDamg = false; public int DCdown = 4;
This is just the spec:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 50; }
and this to:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }
What do I need to change???
pleaseeee help!!!

Read full topic
